unnormalised: Weather-dependent yields, eh? Tell me about it! My granddad, Kishan Lal from Haryana, always said farming is a gamble with Indra Dev. Remember the 2017 floods? Lost half his crop. Hoping for a good monsoon this year, after the terrible heat wave we had on 15/05/2024. Last year, yields were down 30% thanks to erratic rains. Heard some scientists from IARI are working on drought-resistant varieties. Maybe by 2030 we'll see some real change. Fingers crossed!
